document.full_text: alex rodriguez said that his cousin yuri sucart, who accompanies him on some trips, was not violating restrictions imposed after sucart was implicated in rodriguez's past steroid use.
document.title: rodriguez affirms defense of his cousin's presence
lines_and_colors: alex rodriguez said that his cousin yuri sucart, who accompanies him on some trips, was not violating restrictions imposed after sucart was implicated in rodriguez's past steroid use.
